text: "Hitchin' a Ride" was the first single that American punk band Green Day released from their album Nimrod in 1997. ==Track listing== #Hitchin' a Ride #Sick (Non-LP Track) #Espionage (Non-LP Track From Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me original motion picture soundtrack) ==Chart Positions== Year Chart Position 1997 U.S. Modern Rock Tracks 5 1997 U.S. Mainstream Rock Tracks 9 1997 Official UK Singles Chart 25 1997 U.S. Hot 100 Airplay 59 == References == Category:1997 songs Category:Green Day songs
title: Hitchin' a Ride (Green Day song)
